title: Coronavirus update: Early test used on NHS workers 'not effective enough', UK minister says
description: An early test used on thousands of UK healthcare workers was flawed, Australia records three more deaths but is confident it is "successfully" flattening the curve, and the US is warned a second wave of infections next winter could be worse than the first.
content:
Updated 
April 22, 2020 19:58:20
A junior UK health minister has confirmed reports that an early coronavirus test used to establish whether NHS doctors and nurses were safe to return to work was flawed.
In Australia, Deputy Chief Medical Officer Paul Kelly… [+23207 chars]
